item.description: Fourth of July Pub Crawl: Single? Great! Not single? Great! Schedule: The Purple Shamrock 2-3, The Tap 3-4, Bell in Hand 4-5, Hennessy's 5-6, Mystery Bar 6-7 (We can vote on the Mystery Bar of just go for a leisurely walk to the Irish Times, up to you). C'mon! Be a great American and get drunk on Independence Day Weekend! I'll post my cell phone the day of the meetup. This is posted on two other sites so please don't double book.

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Fourth of July Pub Crawl: Faneuil Hall
